name: THE TALL GRASS (nk)
description:
A tiny horror game of patience, perception and memory, loosely inspired by the film 'A Quiet Place', with shades of Slenderman.

Five keys lay hidden in the tall grass, but that's not all that lurks within... Here, the slightest sound might spell death.

Don't give up!


CONTROLS

use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
hold SPACE to sprint
press ESC to quit
LOOK and LISTEN to survive


CREDITS

gameplay, graphics & audio design by me
voice acting by kevatron400


RELEASE HISTORY

v00 (2020.10.21) - initial release
v01 (2020.10.21) - fix brightness slider remembering value, minor balance tweaks
v02 (2020.10.22) - now with rocks!
